taskDescription: ModelScan v0.5.5: MClaude Integration API. Implement proxy endpoints (/v1/messages, /v1/chat/completions), SSE streaming, model remapping, dynamic port with PID file, daemon mode, client registration, aliases, and enhanced key management. See modelscan.0.5.5.plan.md for specs.

features.description: F1: Port Discovery - internal/service/portfile.go - FindOpenPort() scanning 10000-10500
F2: PID File - internal/service/portfile.go - WritePIDFile, ReadPIDFile, RemovePIDFile for ~/.modelscan/modelscan.pid
F3: Server Detection - internal/service/portfile.go - IsServerRunning() checking process existence
F4: Anthropic Proxy - internal/proxy/anthropic.go - POST /v1/messages handler with SSE streaming
F5: OpenAI Proxy - internal/proxy/openai.go - POST /v1/chat/completions handler with SSE streaming
F6: SSE Stream Writer - internal/proxy/stream.go - StreamWriter for chunked responses
F7: Format Translation - internal/proxy/translate.go - Anthropic to OpenAI bidirectional conversion
F8: Daemon Mode - cmd/modelscan-server/daemon.go - Background service with --daemon flag
F9: ListAllModels - internal/service/service.go - Aggregate models from all providers with caching
F10: GetKey Method - internal/service/service.go - Return actual API key string for provider
F11: GetProxyURL - internal/service/service.go - Return http://host:port URL string
F12: Client Model - internal/database/clients.go - Client struct and ClientRepository
F13: Client Registration - internal/admin/clients.go - POST /api/clients/register endpoint
F14: Client Middleware - internal/admin/middleware.go - X-Client-Token validation
F15: Model Hierarchy - internal/admin/models.go - GET /api/models?format=hierarchy grouped by provider/family
F16: Aliases Table - internal/database/aliases.go - Alias model with default aliases (sonnet, opus, haiku, gpt4)
F17: Alias Endpoints - internal/admin/aliases.go - GET/POST/DELETE /api/aliases
F18: Remap Rules Model - internal/database/remaps.go - RemapRule with glob pattern support
F19: Remap Endpoints - internal/admin/remaps.go - CRUD for /api/rules/remap
F20: Remap Middleware - internal/admin/middleware.go - Apply remap rules to proxy requests
F21: Key Test - internal/admin/api.go - POST /api/keys/{id}/test endpoint
F22: Key Delete - internal/admin/api.go - DELETE /api/keys/{id} endpoint
F23: Key Stats - internal/admin/api.go - GET /api/keys/{id}/stats endpoint
F24: Server Info - internal/admin/server.go - GET /api/server/info endpoint
F25: Server Shutdown - internal/admin/server.go - POST /api/server/shutdown endpoint
F26: Request Logging - internal/database/requests.go - RequestLog model and repository
F27: Client Rate Limit - internal/admin/ratelimit.go - Per-client rate limiting
F28: Client Stats - internal/admin/clients.go - GET /api/clients/{id}/stats
F29: Schema Migration - internal/database/schema.go - Add new tables for clients, aliases, remaps, logs
F30: Integration Tests - tests/integration/proxy_test.go - Proxy and API endpoint tests
F31: Documentation - Update AI-README.md and codedocs with v0.5.5 features
